{{Infobox battle item |name = Token Collector |image = [[File:Bag_Token_Collector_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Token Collector''. |price = 1000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Token Collector#Shops|Shops]] *[[Token Collector#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Token Collector''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the drop rate of [[Dungeon Tokens]] by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == +50% Bonus to [[Dungeon Tokens]] gained. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Pewter City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cinnabar Island]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Three Island]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Seven Island]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Violet City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Blackthorn City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Petalburg City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Fallarbor Town]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Mossdeep City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Pacifidlog Town]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Jubilife City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Pastoria City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Snowpoint City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Virbank City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Undella Town]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Humilau City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Santalune City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Coumarine City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Hauoli City]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Seafolk Village]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|1,000 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Mt.
